name: Regentics
description: Regentics ($REGEN) emerges as a bold response to this stagnation—a next-generation project that unites robotics and DeSci (Decentralized Science) to transform the future of medicine. Why $REGEN Is a Game-Changer With $REGEN, experiments don’t sleep. Robotic arms pipette, mix, synthesize, and analyze—without human fatigue or expensive overhead. Anyone from anywhere can deploy a protocol or run a trial using decentralized smart contracts to schedule tasks in physical labs.
